description:
LEARN BY DOING. A CREATIVE, HANDS-ON APPROACH.

In this practical, step-by-step tutorial course, you will learn key tools in Photoshop by creating 7 dynamic images. From start to finish, I will walk you through the process of starting with plain, normal photos, and guide you as we transform them into awesome masterpieces together.

7 FUN PROJECTS OVER 7 DAYS.

Rather than teach you a bunch of scattered concepts, I find that most people get a sense of fulfillment and satisfaction from creating a work from start to finish, and learning along the way. If you learn best by rolling up your sleeves and working in a project-based fashion, then this course is especially for you. Conquer a project a day in this course, and you will find that by the end of a week, you will know much more about Photoshop than when you started.

THE PROJECTS YOU WILL COMPLETE:

Warm Up Project 1: Take a standard nature photo and make it eye-catching and vibrant.

Warm Up Project 2: Learn how to integrate texture into your photo for a creative effect.

Project 3: Take an ordinary afternoon photo, and turn it into a breathtaking sunset.

Project 4: Give a female model a digital, fun, stylish makeover.

Project 5: Take an average sport photo and transform it into a dramatic and gritty scene. Then, we add some rain for good measure!

Project 6: Turn a plain field into a convincing alien scene that is out of this world.

Project 7:Transport a sleek, stunning car from the showroom to the wilderness, and then turn day into night.

Let's roll up our sleeves and get to work!
title: Crush Photoshop In A Week - Learn By Doing
